Title: April and the Extraordinary World
Writer: Franck Ekinci (screenplay), Benjamin Legrand (screenplay), Benjamin Legrand (original idea), Jacques Tardi (graphic novel), Mark Camacho (adaptation), Pauline Little (adaptation)
Actors: Marion Cotillard, Philippe Katerine, Jean Rochefort, Olivier Gourmet
Plot: 1941. France asleep in the nineteenth century, governed by steam and Napoleon V, where scientists vanish mysteriously. Avril (Marion Cotillard), a teenage girl, goes in search of her missing scientist parents.
